us.codecraft.webmagic.selector

类 PlainText

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.selector.AbstractSelectable
      • us.codecraft.webmagic.selector.PlainText
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Selectable
    直接已知子类:
    Json

    public class PlainText
extends AbstractSelectable
    Selectable plain text.
    Can not be selected by XPath or CSS Selector.
    从以下版本开始:
    0.1.0
    作者:
    code4crafter@gmail.com
